question: Which state’s website and application containing details of all its schemes, has been awarded "Elites Excellence Awards-2020"?
explanation:
Chhattisgarh government’s Mukhyamantri Darpan website and mobile application has been awarded "Elites Excellence Awards-2020".
The website and app contains all the flagship schemes of the Chhattisgarh government, including the 'Suraji Gaon Yojna'. The award was announced under the 'Digital India initiative' of Elites Technomedia in a virtual conference inaugurated by Union Minister Nitin Gadkari in New Delhi.
